author: Michael Jordan
text: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often illusions.

author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
text: It's going to be a journey. It's not a sprint to get in shape.

author: Venus Williams
text: Just Believe in yourself. Even if you don't pretend that you do, and some point, you will.

author: Billie Jean King
text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.

author: Mia Hamm
text: It is more difficult to stay on top than to get there

author: Wilma Rudolph
text: It doesn't matter what you're trying to accomplish. It's all a matter of discipline.

author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
text: The only person who an stop you from reaching your goals is you.

author: LeBron James
text: Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.

author: Satchel Paige
text: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.

author: Muhammad Ali
text: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.

author: John Madden
text: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.

author: Thomas Jefferson
text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

author: Heywood Broun
text: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.

author: Knute Rockne
text: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.

author: Earl Monroe
text: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.

author: Zig Ziglar
text: Don't be distracted by criticism. The only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.

author: James Cameron
text: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
